name: Low Places - Spiritual Treatment Cassette.
description:
Southern California's "Low Places" play brutal, crushing, fast, negative hardcore in the vein of Entombed, Cursed, HHIG and just enough powerviolience ala Infest added to the mix to create one of the most negative and brutal releases this year.  A-Side is the new record itself, the B-side however, is the entire record...well...you'll just have to listen to it.  digital downloads are included in this release as well. There will be 100 total available from this site, 30 from the band themselves.  

 INTL ORDERS EMAIL ME BEFORE FINALIZING TRANSACTION, SHIPPING IS MORE WILL FIND THE CHEAPEST AND QUICKEST WAY.

LIMITED EDITION VERSIONS HAVE SOLD OUT FOR INDIVIDUAL ORDERS!!! PLEASE ORDER THE "I WANT IT ALL" COMBO PACK if you want one, and you'll still get the regular one as well, and who knows you may just get a Test Press of the cassette or a Just Die! Test press as well

65 - regular editions on a matte-black tape, also hand numbered. - $7 shipped TO USA/CAN - INTL ORDERS EMAIL ME BEFORE FINALIZING TRANSACTION, SHIPPING IS MORE WILL FIND THE CHEAPEST AND QUICKEST WAY.

check them out here and understand why this record is not a bad precursor to the impending apocalypse.

http://lowplaces.bandcamp.com/

name: Just Die! - "A Momentary Lapse In Positive Thinking" 12" LP
description:
"North Carolina's Just Die are back with another great offering to the Hardcore world. A Momentary Lapse In Positive Thinking digs even deeper into the chaos that is Just Die. Just Die have a great 80's DC area Punk/Hardcore sound. AMLIPT is the 4th release from NC's Just Die and is 10 tracks of short, fast, loud, and pissed off Hardcore the way it was meant to be played. " - The Hive

FFO: Bad Brains, Sick Of It All, Outbreak, Ruiner, Braindead (USA), Shook Ones, American Nightmare, etc.

$12 Shipped TO USA/CAN  INTL PLEASE EMAIL ME, WILL ADD SHIPPING BASED ON LOCATION, AS CHEAP AS POSSIBLE FOR YOU.

STREAM THE RECORD HERE:

http://justdiehardcore.bandcamp.com
